description:
Extended canoe and kayak jaunts feature inevitable splashes and spray. The Temagami Pant is made of a 2.5-ply waterproof-breathable fabric that's lightweight and comfortable. Articulated knees let you switch up your paddling position. An elastic waistband and ankle closures add a customizable, secure fit.

  • eXhaust 2.5-ply fabric is waterproof, breathable and lightweight
  • Elastic waistband with adjustable webbing belt gives you a flexible but secure fit
  • Articulated knees accommodate a variety of paddling positions
  • Hook-and-loop ankle closures help keep out splashes and bugs
name: Level Six Temagami Pants - Unisex
